extensionDescription.message: Remove algorithmic content from Twitter, hide news & trends, control which shared tweets appear on your timeline, and improve the UI

option-ignore.description: Option for not changing existing Twitter functionality - we don't use 'Ignore' for this in English as it could be mistaken to mean 'Hide'

option-hide.description: Option for hiding things, e.g. algorithmic tweets, Twitter Blue checks

option-separate.description: Option for showing Retweets or Quote Tweets in a separate tab from the main timeline

unmuteButtonText.description: Button used in the options page to unmute a muted Quote Tweet

debugCountdownLabel.message: (Debug options: click $DEBUG_COUNTDOWN$ more times to enable)
debugCountdownLabel.description: Displayed when the user clicks multiple times on the info text at the end of the Experiments section to enable debug mode

alwaysUseLatestTweetsLabel.message: Use the Following (chronological) timeline by default

hideSidebarContentLabel.message: Hide "What's happening", "You might like" etc. in the sidebar

showRelevantPeopleLabel.message: Show "Relevant people" when viewing a tweet

hideWhoToFollowEtcLabel.message: Hide "Who to follow", "Follow some Topics" etc. in the timeline

hideExplorePageContentsLabel.message: Hide Explore page contents and use it only for searching

hideUnavailableQuoteTweetsLabel.message: Hide tweets quoting accounts you've blocked or muted

mutableQuoteTweetsInfo.message: Adds a "Mute this conversation" menu item to Quote Tweets
mutableQuoteTweetsInfo.description: The translations for 'Mute this conversation' in tweak-new-twitter.user.js are from Twitter's own locale data

algorithmicTweetsWarning.message: Note: hiding large numbers of tweets can cause performance issues

followeesFollowsLabel.message: Tweets from people followed by people you follow

navBaseFontSizeLabel.message: Use normal text font style in navigation bar

dropdownMenuFontWeightLabel.message: Use normal font weight in dropdown menus

addAddMutedWordMenuItemLabel-desktop.message: Add "Add muted word" to the "More" menu

addAddMutedWordMenuItemLabel-mobile.message: Add "Add muted word" to the slide-out menu

hideViewsLabel.message: Hide views / analytics links under tweets

tweakQuoteTweetsPageLabel.message: Hide the quoted tweet when viewing Quote Tweets

hideUnusedUiItemsOptionsLabel.message: Hide UI items you don't use

hideTweetAnalyticsLinksLabel.message: Analytics links under your own tweets

hideMoreSlideOutMenuItemsOptionsLabel-de.message: Hide "More" menu items you don't use

hideMoreSlideOutMenuItemsOptionsLabel-mo.message: Hide slide-out menu items you don't use

reducedInteractionModeInfo.message: Hide the action bar under tweets – replies are now the only means of interacting

fullWidthContentInfo.message: Hide the sidebar and let timeline content go full-width

verifiedAccountsInfo.message: Highlight tweets by – or interacting with – verified accounts, or hide them to simulate the aftermath of the July 2020 Twitter hacks

disableHomeTimelineInfo.message: Find yourself wasting too much time on Twitter? Try preventing use of the home timeline

debugInfo.message: Enables debug logging and displays tweet debug info in the timeline
